Text: there is no loss in quality on the main feature for this...i reduced the bitrate to 2200kbps on the trailers to make the main feature 100% quality!!!

well i like EXACT copies of dvd-r's.  i like when people dont touch ANYTHING!  or else i dont download/seed.  so when i see a dvd-r that has things taken off/out of it, i delete it immediately.  i dont waste discs on crap.  dont change what you are doing ctang.  keep it the way you are doing it.

hows that?  i felt left out while reading everyone elses wonderful comments!
oh i almost forgot (cuz im a douche)... thank you ctang for another great movie.  you are quality at its best, hands down.

i didnt take out the trailers because the dvd9 version of this about 4.4gb and needed to be slightly reduced to be a dvd5...i took the bitrate from about 4100kbps down to 2200kbps so i could maintain 100% bitrate on the menus, main feature, and special features...the only loss of quality is in the trailers...i do something that most people would just overlook and have some quality loss in the main feature and yet some people still dont like it...you could go buy it if you dont like what im doing...i have never heard of complaining about 100% quality on a main feature...who actually watches the trailers and is like omg i can see a pixel...thats just being nit-picky...and by the way, you shouldnt see any pixels in  the trailers unless you have a tv bigger than 75 inches because thats what i have and i didnt see any pixels in the trailers...well with that im done for the night...goodnight

@zombifuzz:  almost forgot THANK YOU FOR THE SUPPORT BECAUSE AT THE END OF THE DAY, ITS FREE!!!!! LOL :) o and ya IT'S FREE...wow that feels better...i cant believe how people are...i hate to start something but this time i feel like im just hitting back...one could say defending themself per-say...always good to hear from you zombi...keep up your good work as well friend
ya like thats going to happpen
